ProductInfo.Features:
Day & Night Vision Ihome 30-Pin, Camera and DVR Digital Video Recorder built into ihome player, Customize SD Panel Very Discreet!! Invisible IR, see in complete darkness
Ultra High resolution color 550 lines, 1/3" Sony CCD Image Camera, 0.5 Lux Day Video, 0 lux in night time
Fully functional Ihome Player to play your music, Up to 32GB SD card recording storage for dvr
Plug & Play Unit, No need for setup, just plug/unplug ac power to record/stop recording
All accessories include: IR controller for menu setup, Manual, A/V cable, 4GB SD card, 1yr warranty
